name: secureai-tools
description: SecureAI Tools is a self-hosted toolkit for deploying AI models securely with access controls, audit logs, and dedicated inference endpoints. Ideal for enterprises and research teams.
features: Model deployment: Host and serve AI models with dedicated inference endpoints.
Access controls: Implement role-based permissions for model access and usage.
Audit logging: Track all model queries, responses, and user interactions for compliance.
API management: Provide secure REST APIs for model inference with authentication.
Resource isolation: Run models in isolated environments to prevent data leakage.
Usage monitoring: Track token consumption, request rates, and model performance metrics.
Multi-model support: Deploy and manage multiple AI models simultaneously.
Version control: Manage model versions with rollback capabilities for safe updates.
Rate limiting: Control API usage with configurable rate limits per user or application.
Data encryption: Encrypts model inputs, outputs, and stored data at rest and in transit.
Custom endpoints: Create specialized endpoints with preprocessing and postprocessing logic.
Cost tracking: Monitor compute costs and resource utilization per model and user.
